subject: Ticket Scalping
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Fugitives
Soccer
lead_paragraph: An executive with Match Services, the company contracted by FIFA to sell match tickets and hospitality packages, apparently evaded police trying to serve him with an arrest warrant.
snippet: An executive with Match Services, the company contracted by FIFA to sell match tickets and hospitality packages, apparently evaded police trying to serve him with an arrest warrant.
